title: Innovation Bootcamp — October 2025
excerpt: A weekend bootcamp to take your idea from zero to one.
description: Join mentors and founders for a hands-on sprint to validate your idea, build an MVP, and pitch to a panel.

title: AI Hackathon — November 2025
excerpt: 24 hours to build with AI and ship something real.
description: Form teams, ideate, and prototype AI-powered solutions with mentors and prizes.

title: VSIE Demo Day — December 2025
excerpt: Our cohort showcases their startups to investors and partners.
description: Cheer on the latest cohort as they present progress and pitch.
